VFED.DeserterServiceDef.label: lower visibility
VFED.DeserterServiceDef.description: Use intel to convince the deserter network to clear your name and reduce your visibility by 1.

VFED.DeserterServiceDef.label: call shuttle
VFED.DeserterServiceDef.description: Call a one-way deserter shuttle for your own use, which will transport colonists, items, and animals up to 70 tiles away.

VFED.DeserterServiceDef.label: increase goodwill
VFED.DeserterServiceDef.description: Trade intel to convince the deserter network to increase your goodwill with a random faction by 5.

VFED.DeserterServiceDef.label: delay response
VFED.DeserterServiceDef.description: Trade intel to convince the deserter network to create a distraction, increasing the response time on all currently ongoing operations where the counter is already ticking down. This delays the response by 1 minute. Can be used several times.

VFED.DeserterServiceDef.label: taunt imperial forces
VFED.DeserterServiceDef.description: Spend intel to taunt imperial strike force to attack your colony.

VFED.DeserterServiceDef.label: change critical intel
VFED.DeserterServiceDef.description: Trade critical intel for 10 standard intel.
